title: Game gives error upon launching after new windows update?
body: Last night i was playing perfectly fine but after i update my windows and try to get on the game today, i get a error saying the "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working", due to this I cannot even launch my game to the login screen much less play, anyone had a fix for this? Or any ideas? All are helpful please and thanks :)

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10, then these were likely the Anniversary updates, which have been reported to be causing issues for League. In that case, I'd recommend [uninstalling or rolling back](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) those updates to see if it causes the issue to be resolved.

If you're not on windows 10, please let me know.
As of now seeing how to reroll said things, it doesnt give me the option indicating i have been on said build for over a month so this may or may not be the issues? maybe minor updates caused this?

You can either uninstall any updates from the last week or roll back to the build previous to this. [This guide](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) should help you do this.

If you still see issues after that, please let me know.

I am on windows 10 which is why i connected it with the new update although i do not know how to roll back said updates so I will look up a guide to do so and give you a update afterword, hopefully a fix comes soon
